module.title: Resource: Mail: Group
module.log: Add database models for groups and members.
Add database models for servers and roles.
Extend server model by IMAP and SMTP.
Add model for mail group messages.
Extend group model by type, visibility and description.
Add model for mail group actions.
Add hooks to handle confirmed member actions.
Add mails for member status change.
Extract message logic to own class.
module.author: Christian Würker
module.sql: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `<%?prefix%>mail_group_messages`; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `<%?prefix%>mail_group_messages` ( `mailGroupMessageId` int(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `mailGroupId` int(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `mailGroupMemberId` int(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `status` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `parentId` int(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `messageId` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `raw` blob NOT NULL, `object` blob NOT NULL, `createdAt` decimal(12,0) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `modifiedAt` decimal(12,0) UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`mailGroupMessageId`), KEY `mailGroupId` (`mailGroupId`), KEY `mailGroupMemberId` (`mailGroupMemberId`), KEY `status` (`status`), KEY `parentId` (`parentId`), KEY `messageId` (`messageId`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `<%?prefix%>mail_group_actions`; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `<%?prefix%>mail_group_actions` ( `mailGroupActionId` int(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `mailGroupId` int(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `mailGroupMemberId` int(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `status` tinyint(1) NULL DEFAULT '0', `uuid` varchar(40) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `action` varchar(60) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `message` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `createdAt` decimal(12,0) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `modifiedAt` decimal(12,0) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`mailGroupActionId`), KEY `mailGroupId` (`mailGroupId`), KEY `mailGroupMemberId` (`mailGroupMemberId`), KEY `status` (`status`), KEY `uuid` (`uuid`), KEY `action` (`action`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
